(Catalog no. 18851)]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fms9","text":"- Double distlled H2O (ddH2O)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":19,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mnco","text":"- Appropriately sized container","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vgbo","text":"- Concentrated hydrochloric acid ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dks8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d3d6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9fb6g","text":"Add 900 ml of DDH2O to 64.209 grams of sodium cacodylate in a large 1.0L or greater container, such as a capped glass bottle. Shake and wait until powder is fully dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jur8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fri3u","text":"Maximum HCL concentration is 12.18mole/liter (36-38%). Start with 1.3mL of 12.18 M HCL per 900 ml of sodium cacodylate dissolved solution. Make sure solution is mixed thoroughly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fetnv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fh75","text":"Do a final pH check and keep stock solution refrigerated at 4C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9vgf","text":"Check pH. Keep adding 50-100μl of HCL, mix, and check pH again until pH 7.4 has been reached. (Approximately 1.4 ml of conc. HCL total).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: 0.3M Sodium Cacodylate Buffer pH 7.4 Stock Solution Recipe
